UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Acquisition
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from acquisitions.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Legal Settlements
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the estimated loss from legal settlements.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCapitalizedCostDeve.label: Film, Monetized on Its Own, Capitalized Cost, Development and Preproduction
FilmMonetizedOnItsOwnCapitalizedCostDeve.description: Amount of capitalized film cost incurred in development and preproduction of film predominantly monetized on its own.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

DilutiveSecuritiesEffectOnBasicEarningsP.label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, Dilutive Convertible Securities
DilutiveSecuritiesEffectOnBasicEarningsP.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of dilutive convertible securities excluding adjustments related to ESOP convertible preferred stock, stock options, and restrictive stock units.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

PaymentsForLegalSettlements.label: Payments for Legal Settlements
PaymentsForLegalSettlements.description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from reserves and accruals.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsForeign.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Foreign, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsForeign.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign tax credit.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Change in Redemption Value
MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.description: Change in noncontrolling interest during the period as a result of a change in the redemption value of redeemable noncontrolling interest.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

AssetsHeldForSaleLongLivedFairValueDiscl.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Long Lived, Fair Value Disclosure
AssetsHeldForSaleLongLivedFairValueDiscl.description: Fair value portion of assets classified as held for sale.

BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaRevenue.label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Revenue
BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaRevenue.description: The pro forma revenue for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of the period.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Amount of Contingent Consideration, Liability
BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the value of a contingent consideration liability, including, but not limited to, differences arising upon settlement.

ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurre.label: Change in Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Fair Value Hedging Instruments
ChangeInUnrealizedGainLossOnForeignCurre.description: Amount of gain (loss) from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives and nonderivative instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments which were recognized in earnings, net of offsets by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge was determined to be effective.

CommitmentsAndContingencies.label: Commitments and Contingencies
CommitmentsAndContingencies.description: Represents the caption on the face of the balance sheet to indicate that the entity has entered into (1) purchase or supply arrangements that will require expending a portion of its resources to meet the terms thereof, and (2) is exposed to potential losses or, less frequently, gains, arising from (a) possible claims against a company's resources due to future performance under contract terms, and (b) possible losses or likely gains from uncertainties that will ultimately be resolved when one or more future events that are deemed likely to occur do occur or fail to occur.

DeferredCostsCurrent.label: Deferred Costs, Current
DeferredCostsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period that are expected to be charged against earnings within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Foreign
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsPropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxAssetsPropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

EquityMethodInvestmentUnderlyingEquityIn.label: Equity Method Investment, Underlying Equity in Net Assets
EquityMethodInvestmentUnderlyingEquityIn.description: This item represents the entity's ownership percentage in the investee multiplied by the investee's total equity.

FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCapitalizedCostC.label: Film, Monetized in Film Group, Capitalized Cost, Completed and Not Released
FilmMonetizedInFilmGroupCapitalizedCostC.description: Amount of capitalized film cost for completed and not released film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainBeforeTax.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain, before Tax
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain recognized in the income statement.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), before Tax
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossBefore.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets for Financial Service Operations
GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.

GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss, Net of Tax
GoodwillImpairmentLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of loss recognized that results from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCharges.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Charges
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCharges.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of expenditures made during the current reporting period for benefits that will be received over a period of years. Deferred charges differ from prepaid expenses in that they usually extend over a long period of time and may or may not be regularly recurring costs of operation.

IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Gross (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.description: Amount before accumulated amortization of intangible assets, excluding goodwill.

LitigationSettlementExpense.label: Litigation Settlement, Expense
LitigationSettlementExpense.description: Amount of litigation expense, including but not limited to legal, forensic, accounting, and investigative fees.

LossContingencyLossInPeriod.label: Loss Contingency, Loss in Period
LossContingencyLossInPeriod.description: The amount of loss pertaining to the specified contingency that was charged against earnings in the period, including the effects of revisions in previously reported estimates.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNetNonmon.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Net Nonmonetary Assets Acquired (Liabilities Assumed)
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNetNonmon.description: "The net book value of a nonmonetary asset transferred or exchanged in connection with the acquisition of a business or asset in a noncash transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. Nonmonetary assets and liabilities are assets and liabilities that will not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the future."

NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Divestiture, Amount of Consideration Received
NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.description: Amount of noncash consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.label: Proceeds from (Payments to) Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromPaymentsToMinorityShareholde.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from (to) a noncontrolling interest. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ReceivablesLongTermContractsOrPrograms.label: Receivables, Long-term Contracts or Programs
ReceivablesLongTermContractsOrPrograms.description: Amount to be collected within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from customers in accordance with the contractual provisions of long-term contracts or programs including amounts billed and unbilled as of the balance sheet date.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalDivi.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Dividends in Excess of Retained Earnings
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalDivi.description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.

ContractWithCustomerLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueReco.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments, Net, Pretax
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: OCI, Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Gain (Loss), Arising During Period, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Financing Activities
PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability up to amount recognized at acquisition date, including, but not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Parent
ProceedsFromContributionsFromParent.description: The cash inflow from parent as a source of financing that is recorded as additional paid in capital.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.
